definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
(once) again/also/both... and.../and yet/(used for emphasis) anyway
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
to target/to focus on/to be aimed at or against/in response to
counterpart/other person involved/opposite side/other side/receiving party
to fight against/to oppose/to be opposed to/opposition

sentences.english: For Saliou, the work in the mines goes on.
sentences.chinese: 对Saliou来说，矿山的工作还要继续。

sentences.english: The results have important guiding significance on the production safety of fertilizer-related enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果对相关化肥企业的安全生产有指导意义。

sentences.english: And Vergeer admits that "sometimes it's tiring always trying to improve.
sentences.chinese: 沃吉尔承认，“有时会对无尽的提高而感到厌烦。”

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the antiproliferative effects of folate on ovarian cancer cells.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨叶酸对卵巢癌细胞增殖的影响及作用机制。

sentences.english: I think he lives at No. 23 West Street, but I'm not sure about the number.
sentences.chinese: 我想他住在西大街23号，但是我对号码不确定。

sentences.english: This was the call Susan worked so hard to receive.
sentences.chinese: 这个电话对苏珊来说是得之不易的。

sentences.english: The couple arrived at a plain first.
sentences.chinese: 这对夫妇先来到一个平原。

sentences.english: Ageing will put pressure on societies at all levels.
sentences.chinese: 老龄问题将对社会各阶层带来压力。

sentences.english: I only honoured my promise to your father.
sentences.chinese: 我只不过完成了我对你父亲的承诺。

sentences.english: Chapters III and IV make a specific analysis of the international outlook of Fei Xiaotong.
sentences.chinese: 第三章和第四章对费孝通的国际观内涵作具体解析。

sentences.english: The influence of electromagnetic wave on biologic respiratory process is demonstrated by an experiment.
sentences.chinese: 本文用实验证实了电磁波对生物呼吸过程的影响。

sentences.english: After the meeting, I will you, I very well.
sentences.chinese: 经年相遇，我会对你说，我很好。

sentences.english: Zhu told a group of us.
sentences.chinese: 朱先生对着我们一群人说到。

sentences.english: Here, the Asia Water Project summarises the arguments.
sentences.chinese: 以下是亚洲水资源项目对该论题的概述。

sentences.english: Some problems concerned with the mast cells in the cardiac wall were discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文中对心壁内这种细胞的有关问题进行了讨论。

definition: regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
